meanings.definition: The process of creating a document or image by combining photographs and text.
meanings.sent1: Photocomposing involves combining pictures and words to make a new document.
meanings.sent2: I learned about photocomposing in my art class.
meanings.sent3: The photocomposing machine decided to take a break and mix up all the pictures and words!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a photocomposing machine, blending memories and thoughts seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The magic of photocomposing brought the story to life on the page.

meanings.definition: To create a document or image using photographs and text.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys photocomposing family albums to preserve memories.
meanings.sent2: Photocomposing a magazine layout requires attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried photocomposing a message by arranging toys in a pattern.
meanings.sent4: His words photocomposed a vivid picture in her mind.
meanings.sent5: Photocomposing the brochure made the information more engaging for readers.
